name: Reinforce
desc: Summon 4 Seraph Knight allies to help in battle. This is a free action. <green>CD:3 Turns</>
components: not game.check_alive('Falcon5_' + unit.nid) and not game.check_alive('Falcon6_' + unit.nid) and not game.check_alive('Falcon7_' + unit.nid) and not game.check_alive('Falcon8_' + unit.nid)
